title: Amazing grace
verses:
[D]Amazing gr[D7]ace how [G]sweet the [D]sound
That saved a [E7]wretch like [A7]me
I [D]once was [D7]lost but [G]now im [D]found
Was b[E7]lind but no[A7]w i [D]see [A7]

T'was [D]grace that [D7]taught my [G]heart to [D]fear
And grace my [E7]fears [A7]relieved
How [D]precious [D7]did that [G]Grace [D]appear
The [E7]hour I [A7]first bel[D]ieved.[A7]

Through [D]many [D7]dangers, [G]toils and [D]snares
I have [E7]already [A7]come;
'Tis [D]Grace that [D7]brought me [G]safe thus [D]far
and [E7]Grace will [A7]lead me [D]home. [A7]

When we[D]'ve been here[D7] ten thous[G]and y[D]ears
Bright shining [E7]as the [A7]sun.
We've [D]no less [D7]days to s[G]ing God's p[D]raise
Than w[E7]hen we've [A7]first [D]begun.[A7]

[D]Amazing gr[D7]ace how [G]sweet the [D]sound
That saved a [E7]wretch like [A7]me
I [D]once was [D7]lost but [G]now im [D]found
Was b[E7]lind but no[A7]w i [D]see [A]
